Hey man, just DL'd a bunch of your rips - bloody unreal. Thanks very much for taking the time to upload such good quality. I'm going to update most of my lo-res movies with your 1080 versions. I'll seed all of them. Keep up the good work bro - much appreciated..

Most of the movies I pull from you playback with an echo in the audio, do you know what I have to do to fix that? I'm using a Mac, if that matters. And I'm not really techno savvi so in plain English would be awesome :)
Thanks again mate, good stuff..

Got it - playback using VLC corrects it. Should have read your advice first...
Cheers bro

sorry Th3Ch1mp i hadn't seen your comment until just now...

glad you got it sorted out.

quicktime is pretty terrible .. it doesn't seem to understand that mp4's can have more than one audio track and APPEARS to try to play BOTH of them at the same time which obviously sounds terrible.

I generally recommend that ANYONE that experiences any kind of video or audio issues... to attempt to use another player.... it's surprising how many will just not do the job right.
